attributes.action: Oust Borris Johnson for lying to parliament.
attributes.additional_details: High moral and ethical values are paramount to having the trust of the people and other government officials.  Without that trust people will not follow rules and laws set up by parliament.
attributes.background: Parliament should enact stricter ethical codes of conduct and enact legislation with harsher penalties for breaking codes.  Boris Johnson should be removed from the office of Prime minister for his unethical behaviour.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
